hero.title: Mofani wa Ditshebeletso tsa Kaho le Kaonofatso
hero.subtitle: Ha re sebetse feela ka botle; re sebetsa ka ho theha motheo o se nang mathata, o tswellang nako e telele, o khahlisang mahlong bakeng sa ka hare le ka ntle.

about.title: Pono ya Kgwebo
about.description: Kanguya builders e qalile e le basebetsi ba kontraka ba tlwaelo ka 2010 Cape Town, Afrika Borwa, ba nka diporojeke tse nyane tsa kaho Cape Town. Ho tloha 2010-2018, Kanguya builders e ne e tsejwa e le Trust Builders. Bofelong ba 2018, Kanguya builders e fallile Zambia moo re ileng ra nka diporojeke tse mmalwa tsa kaho mme ra fetola lebitso la rona la ba Kanguya Builders Lusaka ho fihlela 2021. Ka 2022, re ile ra kgutla Cape Town, Afrika Borwa moo re ileng ra ipehela ka botlalo e le bapalwali ba matla indastering ya kaho, re nka diporojeke tse nyane le tse mahareng, re etsa mesebetsi ya taolo ya diporojeke, re fana ka ditshebeletso tse ntle, mme re fana ka ditharollo tsa boenjiniere ba kgwebo ho bareki ba rona.
about.visionText: Ho ba dikontrakeng tsa kaho tse hlomphehang le ho fana ho feta tseo e leng tse lebeletsweng ka dinako tsohle le ho kenya letsoho lenaneng la ntlafatso ya motheo wa Afrika le ho bapala karolo ya boqapi ba mesebetsi ho bacha ba Afrika.
about.philosophy: Filosofi ya Rona ya Taolo le Phethahatso ya Diporojeke

philosophyPoints.safety: Ho netefatsa tshireletso le tikoloho e nepahetseng ya ho sebetsa sebakeng ka dinako tsohle
philosophyPoints.planning: Ho theha lenaneo le qaqileng la nako le moralo wa disource ho fihlela dipheo tsa bareki ba rona
philosophyPoints.communication: Ho buisana letsatsi le letsatsi le ba nang le seabo sohle porojekeng
philosophyPoints.tracking: Ho latedisisa tsoelo-pele ya porojeke le ho lokisa
philosophyPoints.supervision: Ho shebella haufi-ufi boleng ba mosebetsi o entsweng
philosophyPoints.completion: Ho phetha le ho qala diporojeke ka nako

services.title: Ditshebeletso Tsa Rona Tsa Kaho
services.subtitle: Ditharollo tse felletseng tsa kaho le kaonofatso ka dilemo tse 14+ tsa boiphihlelo
services.tilingDesc: Kaho ya sethala sa ditshebeletso, mabota le dipindu
services.plasteringDesc: Ditshebeletso tsa setsebi tsa ho phala ka hare le ka ntle
services.brickworkDesc: Kaho ya dithene tsa boleng bakeng sa sebopehelo le botle
services.paintingDesc: Ditshebeletso tsa setsebi tsa ho penta ka hare le ka ntle ka botlalo
services.pavingDesc: Ho thathamela ditsela tsa koloi le ditsela tsa ho tsamaea ka didirisiwa tse matla
services.plumbingDesc: Kaho ya metsi e felletseng le ditshebeletso tsa tokiso
services.carpentryDesc: Mesebetsi ya setso ya lehong le ditharollo tsa botekgeniki
services.maintenanceDesc: Ditshebeletso tse tswellang tsa tlhokomelo le tokiso

footer.description: Re a le amohela ho Kanguya Builders, mohlodi wa hao wa tshepahalo bakeng sa ditshebeletso tsa kaho le kaonofatso tsa boleng bo phahameng. Ka boiphihlelo ba dilemo tse fetang 14 indastering ya kaho, re motlotlo ka ho fana ka ditharollo tse se nang bothata.
